languages.text: "Повезло нам с командиром! Это ж каким отчаянным воякой уродился Комиссар!"
"We got lucky with our commander! The Commissar's a fierce fighter and no mistake!"
languages.original_text: "Повезло нам с командиром! Это ж каким отчаянным воякой уродился Комиссар!"

traits.locale_text: "We sure got lucky with a commander! The Commissar is a plucky fighter and no mistake!"
"We sure got lucky with a commander! The Commissar is a plucky fighter and no mistake!"
"We got lucky with our commander! The Commissar's a fierce fighter and no mistake!"
"We got lucky with our commander! The Commissar's a fierce fighter and no mistake!"
"We got lucky with our commander! The Commissar's a fierce fighter and no mistake!"

languages.text: “有这样的指挥官，我们太幸运了！政委是位勇猛的战士，毫无疑问！”
languages.original_text: "We got lucky with our commander! The Commissar's a fierce fighter and no mistake!"

traits.locale_text: “有这样的指挥官，我们太幸运了！政委是位勇猛的战士，毫无疑问！”

languages.text: 「幸運にも我々には司令が居る！コミッサーは獰猛な戦士に違いない！」
languages.original_text: "We got lucky with our commander! The Commissar's a fierce fighter and no mistake!"

traits.locale_text: 「幸運にも我々には司令が居る！コミッサーは獰猛な戦士に違いない！」

languages.text: « On a eu de la chance avec notre commandant ! Le commissaire est un combattant farouche, c'est indéniable ! »
languages.original_text: "We got lucky with our commander! The Commissar's a fierce fighter and no mistake!"

traits.locale_text: « On a eu de la chance avec notre commandant ! Le commissaire est un combattant farouche, c'est indéniable ! »

languages.text: «¡Nos ha tocado el premio con nuestro comandante! ¡El Comisario sí que sabe luchar!».
languages.original_text: "We got lucky with our commander! The Commissar's a fierce fighter and no mistake!"

traits.locale_text: «¡Nos ha tocado el premio con nuestro comandante! ¡El Comisario sí que sabe luchar!».

languages.text: "Wir hatte Glück mit unserem Commander! Der Kommissar ist ein grimmiger Kämpfer, so viel steht fest!"
languages.original_text: "We got lucky with our commander! The Commissar's a fierce fighter and no mistake!"

traits.locale_text: "Wir hatte Glück mit unserem Commander! Der Kommissar ist ein grimmiger Kämpfer, so viel steht fest!"

languages.text: "Bahtımız açıkmış ki iyi bir komutanımız var! Komiser, yaman dövüşçüdür. Kimse şüphe etmesin!"
languages.original_text: "We got lucky with our commander! The Commissar's a fierce fighter and no mistake!"

traits.locale_text: "Bahtımız açıkmış ki iyi bir komutanımız var! Komiser yaman savaşçıdır, kimse şüphe etmesin!"
